text: Sirous Taherian سیروس طاهریان (born 20 August 1965) is an Iranian player and coach of water polo. He is a goalkeeper who played in a 1990, 1994, 1998 and won at Asian Games. As coach he won in the 2015 FINA World Water Polo Development Trophy. He is now technical staff director of the Iran national water polo team. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Iranian male water polo players Category:Living people
title: Sirous Taherian
